original_text: At that time, the Lord will punish Leviathan. The Lord will use his great and powerful sword to destroy that monster. Leviathan is a snake that moves very fast in the sea and it turns in every direction. But the Lord will kill it.
korean_text: 그 날에 여호와께서 그의 견고하고 크고 강한 칼로 날랜 뱀 리워야단 곧 꼬불꼬불한 뱀 리워야단을 벌하시며 바다에 있는 용을 죽이시리라

sentences.original_text: At that time, the Lord will punish Leviathan.
The Lord will use his great and powerful sword
sentences.korean_translation: 여호와께서 그의 위대하고 강력한 검을 사용하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Leviathan is a snake that moves very fast in the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 리워야단은 바다에서 매우 빠르게 움직이는 뱀입니다

sentences.original_text: and it turns in every direction.
But the Lord will kill it.
